oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: President Roosevelt speech - 1941-12-09 - Part 3
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Part 3 of President Roosevelt's speech in response to the attack on Pearl Harbor, recorded on December 9, 1941. Part 1 can be found at TR003795_1 and Part 2 can be found at TR003795_2.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: (0:00) President Roosevelt recites his speech [incomplete] / (4:04) [Unidentified radio announcer] talks about the speech / (4:15) Performance of the Star-Spangled Banner / (5:40) NBC call letters announced
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Roosevelt, Franklin D. (Franklin Delano), 1882-1945; National Broadcasting Company
